name: Inputs
description: Provide data in the following required inputs ('Deconvolution Data' is OPTIONAL).

name: Inputs/scRNA-Seq Data
description: Provide the required scRNA/snRNA-Seq data and its corresponding cell type field.

name: Inputs/Spatial Data
description: Provide the required spatial transcriptomic data and, optionally, its corresponding cluster field.

name: Inputs/Genes to Plot
description: Provide a one-line .gmt file of genes to plot as observed vs expected transcription of in space.

name: Inputs/OPTIONAL: Deconvolution Data
description:
Optionally, for carrying out deconvolution, provide a histological image in the following format.
Note: You must set the alignment mode to 'constrained'

name: Output Filenames
description: Output filename tag for generated plots and data.

name: Algorithmic Parameters
description: Options for specifying how the algorithm is carried out.
